price: If they reject you [O Prophet], the people of Noah, ‘Ād and Thamūd before them also rejected [their prophets],
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
